contentfulSiteSettings.heroBio: Reignite your natural, innate desires and to return to a more holistic, earth-based approach.
contentfulSiteSettings.feature1Text: Consider Herbs is here to offer ways to connect with mother nature and make holistic choices.
contentfulSiteSettings.feature2Text: In our Shop, we provide the opportunity to purchase herbal supplements and tonics that empower you!
contentfulSiteSettings.feature3Text: We can help you to incorporate herbs, oils, teas, food, and tinctures to ensure the wellbeing of your mind, body and spirit.
